summary: SAP SE is a German software company that creates programs to help businesses run smoothly and manage their customer relationships. It is the world's top provider of ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) software. Founded in 1972 as Systemanalyse und Programmentwicklung, the company has grown and changed its name several times. Now known as SAP SE, it operates in 180 countries with over 111,000 employees. SAP is a significant player in the global software industry and is listed on major stock market indices.
title: SAP
